about_the_game:
The wait is over! The demo of The Lost Myth is now available on Steam.

Embark on an epic adventure in this turn-based fantasy RPG inspired by classic SNES games. Explore the mystical region of Ancaria, where every corner hides secrets and legends waiting to be uncovered.

What awaits you in the demo?

Dive into the Prologue and of a captivating story filled with memorable characters and unexpected twists. Experience a vibrant, detailed pixelated world, and witness the fate of your heroes. Best of all, you’ll be able to continue your adventure in the full game!

Key Features:

  • Retro Style: Enjoy pixel art design that pays homage to the classics of the '90s.

  • Turn-Based Combat System: Engage in strategic and exciting battles that will test your skills.

  • Immersive Narrative: Immerse yourself in a rich and thrilling story that will captivate you from the very start.

Don’t miss the chance to be part of this unique adventure! Download the demo of The Lost Myth and start your journey today.
